Name: med-rec
Title: Medication Reconciliation
Description: Review and reconcile home medications with current orders after admission
Rationale: Prevents medication errors during transitions of care

Name: lab-followup
Title: Lab Result Follow-up
Description: Review abnormal potassium result and determine need for intervention
Rationale: Timely response to critical labs reduces adverse events

Name: vax-outreach
Title: Vaccination Outreach
Description: Contact patient to schedule overdue influenza vaccination

Name: referral-track
Title: Referral Tracking
Description: Confirm cardiology referral appointment was scheduled and attended
Rationale: Closes the loop on specialist referrals

Name: discharge-call
Title: Post-Discharge Follow-up Call
Description: Call patient within 48 hours of discharge to assess symptoms and medication adherence
Rationale: Reduces readmission risk through early post-discharge support
